name: placebo Action Adventure
description: Placebo is An Epic Adventure platformer that will have you gunning n slashing till your battery melts , with a unique story line and a awesome gameplay and characters and great music . with a price of a coffe you get to own an endless well made premium game , design to turn your phone into a real solid portable game console , placebo story is presented in form of episodes , where each contains various sequence levels and diverse challenges and game mechanics with no cost apart from the initial price tag . IssamProd team delivered a very beautiful and nostalgic pixelated game that plays and feels very modern and smoothy animated .
